name: Linkies (itch)
description:
Meet the Linkies in this puzzle platformer.

They all move at the same time, but with different speed.

Make use of their differences to complete the different levels. Certain stages are purely puzzle while other also challenge your platforming skills.

Feel stuck?
Take a moment to observe how they move. Maybe some have a particularity that you can take advantage of.

Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 "Joined Together"
